ai-tha-ap285:1.1_0: “Like he wandered around like a lion,
ai-tha-ap285:1.2_0: like a flame in the wind.
ai-tha-ap285:2.1_0: the flame of the world’s end.
ai-tha-ap285:2.3_0: I went to meet him in the lower realm.
ai-tha-ap285:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap285:3.2_0: I’ve cut the net of the deathless.
ai-tha-ap285:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap285:3.4_0: while this fruit is out to come out,
ai-tha-ap285:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Udena.
ai-tha-ap285:7.1_0: The third (who returns to) the Elder Nuniyans,
